scripts.remove-builds: (cd packages/api && rm -rf build) & (cd packages/shared && rm -rf dist)
scripts.build: yarn remove-builds && yarn init-shared-build && yarn build-api && yarn build-shared
scripts.watch-build: yarn remove-builds && yarn init-shared-build && (yarn build-api:watch & (sleep 3 && yarn build-shared:watch))
scripts.start-server: (cd packages/api && yarn dev) & (cd packages/frontend && yarn dev)
